Package org.wildfly.security.audit

Class SimpleSecurityEventFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildfly.security.auth.server.event.SecurityEventVisitor<java.lang.Void,​java.lang.String>
      • org.wildfly.security.audit.SimpleSecurityEventFormatter
  • public class SimpleSecurityEventFormatter
extends SecurityEventVisitor<java.lang.Void,​java.lang.String>
    A formatter for security events that converts events into human-readable strings.
    Author:
    Darran Lofthouse
